name: P.T Reborn
description:
Welcome to P.T: Reborn is a short horror game, recreating the atmosphere and gameplay of the PT originally published on Playstation 4. This has some gameplay, but I also came with some own personal touches and tasks.

Features:

  • Full gameplay recreated including ending cutscene.
  • Great graphics and a creepy and tense atmosphere.
  • A creepy ghost hunting around.

Additional Help:

When reaching the bathroom, you need to find the proper place to hold the flashlight, that part is a little bit tricky, all you gotta do is to find a proper place and zoom on the flashlight in order to pick it up.

P.T: Reborn is a non-profit project which is being developed by a solo indie developer.

Recommended Requirements:

  • GPU - Nvidia GeForce GTX 1650
  • CPU - Intel Core i5 9400f (3GB) or equivalent.
  • Memory - 16GB
  • Disk Space - 1.3GB
  • No internet required to play.

Minimum Requirements:

  • GPU - Nvidia GeForce GTX 750
  • CPU - Intel Core i3 3240
  • Memory - 6GB
  • Disk Space - 1.3GB
  • No internet required to play.
